title: Featured Projects
subtitle: Showcasing some of my best work across various technologies and platforms

projects.title: Clearance Management System
projects.description: A Clearance Management System designed to efficiently monitor student clearance statuses and manage remarks, ensuring a streamlined and organized process.

projects.title: Online Ordering and Inventory Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive capstone project for Claytonecille General Merchandising that showcases an eCommerce platform combined with an inventory management system. It features seamless PayPal payment integration for secure transactions, real-time stock tracking, and an intuitive interface for managing and selling a variety of products and merchandise. Designed to enhance user experience and streamline business operations.

projects.title: Marketing Analytics Dashboard

projects.title: Clearance Management System

projects.title: Marketing Workflow Automation
projects.description: Custom workflow automation for marketing and CRM processes using Zapier and custom API integrations.
